key.name: smooth-scrolling
key.description: This key determines whether webkit will enable smooth scrolling support, which can end up being resource intensive.

key.name: page-cache
key.description: This key determines whether webkit will enable page caching, which can end up being resource intensive.

key.name: javascript
key.description: This key determines whether webkit will enable javascript support.

key.name: mediasource
key.description: This key determines whether webkit will enable media source, needed for video content.

key.name: homepage
key.description: This key determines which web will be opened for new tabs and startup.
